65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Yahya bin Bukair] dia berkata; Telah menceritakan kepadaku [Bakr] dari [Ja'far] dari ['Irak bin Malik] dari [Ubaidullah bin Abdullah bin 'Utbah bin Mas'ud] dari [Ibnu Abbas radliallahu 'anhuma] dia berkata; 'Bulan terbelah pada masa Nabi shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam

chapter.ara-name: باب {وَانْشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ * وَإِنْ يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا}
chapter.eng-name: "...And the moon has been cleft asunder (the people of Makkah requested Prophet (ﷺ) Muḥammad ﷺ to show them a miracle, so he showed them the splitting of the moon). And if they see a sign, they turn away..." (V.54:1,2)
